remarks: A case of equivalence of "at most one" and "only one".  If a class is inhabited, that class having at most one element is equivalent to it having only one element.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 31-Jul-2018.)
statement:
n0mmoeu $p |- ( E. x x e. A -> ( E* x x e. A <-> E! x x e. A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
